author: mkalen
msg: Use a PreparedStatement for the validation query to increase JDBC-driver cachability (driver dependent).

author: mkalen
msg: Fix DBCP connection factory to call platform-specific connection init. Resolve issue with statement caching in both DBCP pool and Oracle-driver by disabling DBCP-caching if platform=Oracle9i (since DBCP does not know how to manage Oracle server-side cursors correctly).

author: mkalen
msg: Upgrade deprecated Torque property "database" to "torque.database" (hope this plays nice with Torque from CVS HEAD).

author: mkalen
msg: Merge with OJB_1_0_RELEASE branch: Patch by Don Lyon: add support for Oracle-extensions and large LOB support using Oracle9i with JBoss.
